pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Inference for Systems of Ordinary Differential Equations using Separable Integral-Matching // Implements statistical inference for systems of ordinary differential equations, that uses the integral-matching criterion and takes advantage of the separability of parameters, in order to obtain initial parameter estimates for nonlinear least squares optimization. Dattner Yaari (2018) arXiv:1807.04202. Dattner et al. (2017) doi:10.1098/rsif.2016.0525. Dattner Klaassen (2015) doi:10.1214/15-EJS1053.
